model.name: routingSlip
model.title: Routing Slip
model.description: Routes a message through a series of steps that are pre-determined (the slip)
model.label: eip,endpoint,routing

uriDelimiter.description: Sets the uri delimiter to use

ignoreInvalidEndpoints.description: Ignore the invalidate endpoint exception when try to create a producer with that endpoint

cacheSize.description: Sets the maximum size used by the org.apache.camel.impl.ProducerCache which is used to cache and reuse producers when using this recipient list when uris are reused.

expression.description: Expression to define the routing slip which defines which endpoints to route the message in a pipeline style. Notice the expression is evaluated once if you want a more dynamic style then the dynamic router eip is a better choice.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
